ValidationRule.description: Requires Stage Detail for all Opportunities that are Lost.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( IsClosed, NOT(IsWon), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Order Lost')), ISBLANK(TEXT(Stage_Detail__c)), NOT($User.Exempt_from_Validation_Rules__c), OR(RecordType.Name='Benefits Renewal', RecordType.Name='Benefits Change') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select the Stage Detail as to why this Opportunity was lost.
